mapper.sql: select UNIT_VIEW.UNIT_NBR AS CONTENEDOR, UNIT_VIEW.TYPE_ISO AS TIPO, UNIT_VIEW.TIME_OUT AS FECHASALIDA, 'IMPORT' AS ESTATUS from UNIT_VIEW where TRIM(UNIT_VIEW.T_STATE) = 'DEPARTED' AND UNIT_VIEW.LINE_OP NOT IN ('HLC', 'NYK', 'CMA', 'TSH', 'SLI', 'OOL', 'CPL','NCL') AND UNIT_VIEW.CATEGORY = 'IMPRT' AND TRIM(UNIT_VIEW.FRGHT_KIND) = 'FCL' AND UNIT_VIEW.TIME_OUT IS NOT NULL AND UNIT_VIEW.UNIT_NBR = upper(#{digito_verificador}) AND UNIT_VIEW.CONSIGNEE_ID is null AND UNIT_VIEW.T_STATE<> 'INBOUND'
